title: Strugienice
text:
Strugienice is a <a href="village">village</a> in the administrative district of <a href="Gmina%20Zduny%2C%20%C5%81%C3%B3d%C5%BA%20Voivodeship">Gmina Zduny</a>, within <a href="%C5%81owicz%20County">Łowicz County</a>, <a href="%C5%81%C3%B3d%C5%BA%20Voivodeship">Łódź Voivodeship</a>, in central Poland. It lies approximately south of <a href="Zduny%2C%20%C5%81owicz%20County">Zduny</a>, west of <a href="%C5%81owicz">Łowicz</a>, and north-east of the regional capital <a href="%C5%81%C3%B3d%C5%BA">Łódź</a>.
The village has a population of 490.
